comment_body:
In r/AmItheAsshole I'd go for a ESH.

You're not responsible for moving in a richer neighborhood and it looks like you did your best to adapt and still have friendS. Unfortunately you ended up surrounded by people who think high of themselves and never had the opportunity to mature. That doesn't make thel narcissists though. And the fact that you can't stand them doesn't make you a narcissist either.

NPD is a complex disorder that implies a lot of symptoms and it cannot be diagnosed through anecdotes such as those. I'd say move away as soon as you can and go for different friends because those seem to be exhausting and bring you no joy.
